import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import { Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' import './styles.css' function Signin({ openModal, setOpenModal }) { const emailRef = useRef(emailRef) const passwordRef = useRef(passwordRef) const [signin, setSignin] = useState(true) return ( setOpenModal(false)} onOpen={() => setOpenModal(true)} open={openModal} >
